field.name: summary
field.value: Boo compiler chokes on overloaded ToString call

field.name: description
field.value:
Copied from http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-devel/browse_frm/thread/83385b06c6959895/897abe38ea43601f#897abe38ea43601f
I have a view like this: <% output today.ToString("MM/dd/yyyy") %>
where today is set via PropertyBag["today"] = DateTime.Now
This gives me the following error: Error during compile: (4,30): BCE0017: Boo.Lang.Compiler.CompilerError: The best overload for the method 'System.Object.ToString()' is not compatible with the argument list '(string)'.
Input (home\index.brail) output """My View contents for Home\Index """
output today.ToString("MM/dd/yyyy")
